reviews.review_title: Great cleaning power, but prefer the yellow scent!
reviews.review_text:
Tide is a dependable laundry detergent that consistently delivers clean, fresh clothes. This version performs really well on regular loads - removing dirt, sweat, and even mild stains without much effort. I appreciate how little product is needed for each wash, and it works just as well in cold water, which helps save energy too.

However, I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the scent. It’s not unpleasant, but I personally prefer the fragrance that comes with the yellow packaging (Tide Original). That scent feels fresher and more classic to me, while this one is a bit too heavy in comparison.

Still, as far as cleaning ability goes, Tide continues to be one of the most reliable detergents out there. If scent isn’t a big deal for you, then this is a great choice for day-to-day laundry needs.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2025

reviews.review_title: If Clean Laundry Had a Superhero, This Would Be It
reviews.review_text:
Why did you pick this product vs others?:
Let me just say: if my laundry could talk, it would sing ballads about Tide Ultra Oxi. This stuff doesn’t just clean clothes—it rescues them. I had a shirt that looked like it had been through a toddler birthday party, a barbecue, and maybe a minor explosion. One wash with this magic potion and boom—back to looking like I don’t live in chaos.

It smells amazing too. Like if “fresh” and “confidence” had a baby. Every time I pull clothes from the washer, I feel like I should toss them in the air in slow motion like a fabric softener commercial.

And the 94 loads? I swear it’s bottomless. I’ve washed everything but the dog at this point, and I’m still not out.

Buy it. Use it. Smell amazing. Thank Tide later.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2025

reviews.review_text: I work outside a lot and get grass stains, dirt, and blood on my work clothes. It works really well getting all of these stains (and my smells) out of my clothes. The size of the detergent bottle may seem a little daunting since it's big, but it is easy to use once you lay it on its side and make sure the air release cap is fastened tightly when not pouring the detergent. Sometime I soak my clothes in the detergent for a longer lasting effect of the cleaning process. After a long soak, I run it through the regular cycle and my clothes look like they've never been stained. Pay attention to the inside of the cap in which you pour the detergent. It has little bars which recommends how much detergent you should use depending on the load size, so you can stretch how much of the detergent you use and not waste any.

reviews.review_title: It's hard to beat the results it delivers.
reviews.review_text:
I've been using Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent HE Compatible for some time now, and overall, I'm impressed. The detergent keeps my clothing bright, smelling fresh, and feels light. It's become a staple in my laundry routine, especially because it's gentle on sensitive skin and doesn't cause any post-wash itchiness.

The only drawback I've encountered is the packaging. The large container tends to get a bit messy during pouring, with some detergent dripping around the spout, even when I'm careful with the cap. However, this is a minor inconvenience compared to the excellent cleaning performance and skin-friendly benefits.

Despite the pouring issue, I remain loyal to Tide Ultra Oxi. It's hard to beat the results it delivers. If you're looking for a detergent that keeps clothes bright, fresh, and is gentle on the skin, this is a great choice. Just be mindful when pouring to avoid any spills!

reviews.review_text:
I've been using the Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent (94 loads, 146 fl oz, HE Compatible) for a while now. While I can't complain about its cleaning power, there's a significant design flaw that's been a constant hassle.

The detergent itself works great. Clothes come out clean, and the Oxi boost seems to do a good job at tackling tough stains. However, every time I use it, I end up with detergent on my laundry room floor. The issue seems to be with the bottle's design - no matter how careful I am, it drips after pouring.

I've tried various methods to avoid this - pouring slowly, wiping the spout after each use, but nothing seems to prevent the inevitable spill. It's frustrating, as I have to clean up after every laundry session.

Overall, I'm giving it 3 stars. The detergent does what it's supposed to do, but the mess it creates is a design issue that needs addressing. If you don't mind the extra cleanup, it's a solid choice. Otherwise, you might want to look for a better-designed container.

reviews.review_title: It's hard to beat the results it delivers.
reviews.review_text:
I've been using Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent HE Compatible for some time now, and overall, I'm impressed. The detergent keeps my clothing bright, smelling fresh, and feels light. It's become a staple in my laundry routine, especially because it's gentle on sensitive skin and doesn't cause any post-wash itchiness.

The only drawback I've encountered is the packaging. The large container tends to get a bit messy during pouring, with some detergent dripping around the spout, even when I'm careful with the cap. However, this is a minor inconvenience compared to the excellent cleaning performance and skin-friendly benefits.

Despite the pouring issue, I remain loyal to Tide Ultra Oxi. It's hard to beat the results it delivers. If you're looking for a detergent that keeps clothes bright, fresh, and is gentle on the skin, this is a great choice. Just be mindful when pouring to avoid any spills!

reviews.review_text: Tide Ultra Oxi is a game changer for tough stains. It easily removes dirt, grease, and mystery marks from clothes in just one wash. reviews.review_text: I work outside a lot and get grass stains, dirt, and blood on my work clothes. It works really well getting all of these stains (and my smells) out of my clothes. The size of the detergent bottle may seem a little daunting since it's big, but it is easy to use once you lay it on its side and make sure the air release cap is fastened tightly when not pouring the detergent. Sometime I soak my clothes in the detergent for a longer lasting effect of the cleaning process. After a long soak, I run it through the regular cycle and my clothes look like they've never been stained. Pay attention to the inside of the cap in which you pour the detergent. It has little bars which recommends how much detergent you should use depending on the load size, so you can stretch how much of the detergent you use and not waste any.

reviews.review_title: Great cleaning power, but prefer the yellow scent!
reviews.review_text:
Tide is a dependable laundry detergent that consistently delivers clean, fresh clothes. This version performs really well on regular loads - removing dirt, sweat, and even mild stains without much effort. I appreciate how little product is needed for each wash, and it works just as well in cold water, which helps save energy too.

However, I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the scent. It’s not unpleasant, but I personally prefer the fragrance that comes with the yellow packaging (Tide Original). That scent feels fresher and more classic to me, while this one is a bit too heavy in comparison.

Still, as far as cleaning ability goes, Tide continues to be one of the most reliable detergents out there. If scent isn’t a big deal for you, then this is a great choice for day-to-day laundry needs.
reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2025

reviews.review_text: I'm usually hesitant buying detergent online because they almost always send me the wrong one and I'm nervous it will leak everywhere. Let me tell you - the packaging for this detergent was top notch. It was so secure in its own separate box in another box so I didn't even realize what I was opening at first. It almost seemed a little overkill but it made sure that nothing was going to open or spill so I was really impressed. Didn't think I would ever be "fan girling" amazon packaging but here we are. They also sent me the right one that I ordered. I got it on sale which was nice. And the detergent itself is great. A little goes a long way. Happy customer here. I recommend.

all_reviews.review_title: Great cleaning power, but prefer the yellow scent!
all_reviews.review_text:
Tide is a dependable laundry detergent that consistently delivers clean, fresh clothes. This version performs really well on regular loads - removing dirt, sweat, and even mild stains without much effort. I appreciate how little product is needed for each wash, and it works just as well in cold water, which helps save energy too.

However, I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the scent. It’s not unpleasant, but I personally prefer the fragrance that comes with the yellow packaging (Tide Original). That scent feels fresher and more classic to me, while this one is a bit too heavy in comparison.

Still, as far as cleaning ability goes, Tide continues to be one of the most reliable detergents out there. If scent isn’t a big deal for you, then this is a great choice for day-to-day laundry needs.
all_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2025

all_reviews.review_title: If Clean Laundry Had a Superhero, This Would Be It
all_reviews.review_text:
Why did you pick this product vs others?:
Let me just say: if my laundry could talk, it would sing ballads about Tide Ultra Oxi. This stuff doesn’t just clean clothes—it rescues them. I had a shirt that looked like it had been through a toddler birthday party, a barbecue, and maybe a minor explosion. One wash with this magic potion and boom—back to looking like I don’t live in chaos.

It smells amazing too. Like if “fresh” and “confidence” had a baby. Every time I pull clothes from the washer, I feel like I should toss them in the air in slow motion like a fabric softener commercial.

And the 94 loads? I swear it’s bottomless. I’ve washed everything but the dog at this point, and I’m still not out.

Buy it. Use it. Smell amazing. Thank Tide later.
all_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2025

all_reviews.review_text: I work outside a lot and get grass stains, dirt, and blood on my work clothes. It works really well getting all of these stains (and my smells) out of my clothes. The size of the detergent bottle may seem a little daunting since it's big, but it is easy to use once you lay it on its side and make sure the air release cap is fastened tightly when not pouring the detergent. Sometime I soak my clothes in the detergent for a longer lasting effect of the cleaning process. After a long soak, I run it through the regular cycle and my clothes look like they've never been stained. Pay attention to the inside of the cap in which you pour the detergent. It has little bars which recommends how much detergent you should use depending on the load size, so you can stretch how much of the detergent you use and not waste any.

all_reviews.review_title: It's hard to beat the results it delivers.
all_reviews.review_text:
I've been using Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent HE Compatible for some time now, and overall, I'm impressed. The detergent keeps my clothing bright, smelling fresh, and feels light. It's become a staple in my laundry routine, especially because it's gentle on sensitive skin and doesn't cause any post-wash itchiness.

The only drawback I've encountered is the packaging. The large container tends to get a bit messy during pouring, with some detergent dripping around the spout, even when I'm careful with the cap. However, this is a minor inconvenience compared to the excellent cleaning performance and skin-friendly benefits.

Despite the pouring issue, I remain loyal to Tide Ultra Oxi. It's hard to beat the results it delivers. If you're looking for a detergent that keeps clothes bright, fresh, and is gentle on the skin, this is a great choice. Just be mindful when pouring to avoid any spills!

all_reviews.review_text:
I've been using the Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent (94 loads, 146 fl oz, HE Compatible) for a while now. While I can't complain about its cleaning power, there's a significant design flaw that's been a constant hassle.

The detergent itself works great. Clothes come out clean, and the Oxi boost seems to do a good job at tackling tough stains. However, every time I use it, I end up with detergent on my laundry room floor. The issue seems to be with the bottle's design - no matter how careful I am, it drips after pouring.

I've tried various methods to avoid this - pouring slowly, wiping the spout after each use, but nothing seems to prevent the inevitable spill. It's frustrating, as I have to clean up after every laundry session.

Overall, I'm giving it 3 stars. The detergent does what it's supposed to do, but the mess it creates is a design issue that needs addressing. If you don't mind the extra cleanup, it's a solid choice. Otherwise, you might want to look for a better-designed container.
all_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023

all_reviews.review_title: It's hard to beat the results it delivers.
all_reviews.review_text:
I've been using Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent HE Compatible for some time now, and overall, I'm impressed. The detergent keeps my clothing bright, smelling fresh, and feels light. It's become a staple in my laundry routine, especially because it's gentle on sensitive skin and doesn't cause any post-wash itchiness.

The only drawback I've encountered is the packaging. The large container tends to get a bit messy during pouring, with some detergent dripping around the spout, even when I'm careful with the cap. However, this is a minor inconvenience compared to the excellent cleaning performance and skin-friendly benefits.

Despite the pouring issue, I remain loyal to Tide Ultra Oxi. It's hard to beat the results it delivers. If you're looking for a detergent that keeps clothes bright, fresh, and is gentle on the skin, this is a great choice. Just be mindful when pouring to avoid any spills!

all_reviews.review_text: Tide Ultra Oxi is a game changer for tough stains. It easily removes dirt, grease, and mystery marks from clothes in just one wash. The scent is fresh without being overwhelming, and a little goes a long way—this bottle really does last for over 90 loads. Plus, it’s compatible with my HE washer, which is a big plus. Definitely worth the price for how well it works.
all_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2025

all_reviews.review_text: I work outside a lot and get grass stains, dirt, and blood on my work clothes. It works really well getting all of these stains (and my smells) out of my clothes. The size of the detergent bottle may seem a little daunting since it's big, but it is easy to use once you lay it on its side and make sure the air release cap is fastened tightly when not pouring the detergent. Sometime I soak my clothes in the detergent for a longer lasting effect of the cleaning process. After a long soak, I run it through the regular cycle and my clothes look like they've never been stained. Pay attention to the inside of the cap in which you pour the detergent. It has little bars which recommends how much detergent you should use depending on the load size, so you can stretch how much of the detergent you use and not waste any.
all_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2025

all_reviews.review_text: Tide Ultra Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent is a top-notch product that delivers powerful cleaning with every load. It effectively removes stains, even tough ones, while keeping clothes smelling fresh. The formula is HE-compatible, making it ideal for high-efficiency washers. With 94 loads in a 132 fl oz bottle, it's also great value for money. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable, high-performance detergent.

all_reviews.review_title: Great cleaning power, but prefer the yellow scent!
all_reviews.review_text:
Tide is a dependable laundry detergent that consistently delivers clean, fresh clothes. This version performs really well on regular loads - removing dirt, sweat, and even mild stains without much effort. I appreciate how little product is needed for each wash, and it works just as well in cold water, which helps save energy too.

However, I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the scent. It’s not unpleasant, but I personally prefer the fragrance that comes with the yellow packaging (Tide Original). That scent feels fresher and more classic to me, while this one is a bit too heavy in comparison.

Still, as far as cleaning ability goes, Tide continues to be one of the most reliable detergents out there. If scent isn’t a big deal for you, then this is a great choice for day-to-day laundry needs.
all_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2025

all_reviews.review_text: I'm usually hesitant buying detergent online because they almost always send me the wrong one and I'm nervous it will leak everywhere. Let me tell you - the packaging for this detergent was top notch. It was so secure in its own separate box in another box so I didn't even realize what I was opening at first. It almost seemed a little overkill but it made sure that nothing was going to open or spill so I was really impressed. Didn't think I would ever be "fan girling" amazon packaging but here we are. They also sent me the right one that I ordered. I got it on sale which was nice. And the detergent itself is great. A little goes a long way. Happy customer here. I recommend.
